ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and Well met Kamorm, I have a 32 Barb Shammy and I am wondering when can I start my Epic? And aside from hunting the HG in RM where can I go to get good
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and Well met Kamorm,

I have a 32 Barb Shammy and I am wondering when can I start my Epic? And
aside from hunting the HG in RM where can I go to get good xp and cash so I
can finance my Alchemy materials as well as save up for spells and such?
Also what are the Ancient Scrolls? and when can they be gone after?


Halyburton Bearhugger 32 Barb Shammy
Qapmoc 11 Half Elf Ranger
Doktari 7 High Elf Cleric
Defender of the Faith
Saryn
----- Original Message -----
From: "John" <kamorm@...>



> Hail,
>
> I have been at this stoopid game for close to 3 years. My crowning
> achievement so far (150 days played, cause I love to 'smell the
> flowers') is lvl 60 epiced shaman with complete spellbook
> (no 'Ancient Scrolls' yet) and 25 AA pts. Even after playing EQ for
> this amount of time there is so much I am unfamiliar with, mostly the
> old world, feel like newbie often :)
>
> I do however have humble knowledge of the Barbarian Shaman class, the
> continent of Antonica and many of the kunark and velious zones. I
> hang out mostly in luclin zones atm. I belong to a smallish guild (60
> members) that I have been in for 2 years (since early 30's) we are
> just now approaching some of the higher end encounters.
>
> I know I will learn from you folks and hopefully be able to
> contribute in some humble manner.
>
> Kamorm Winterstalker
> Oralce of Coinfist
> Innoruuk Server
>
